data.title: Albert Einstein – Nobel Lecture
data.meta_description: The Nobel Prize in Physics 1921 was awarded to Albert Einstein "for his services to Theoretical Physics, and especially for his discovery of the law of the photoelectric effect"
data.text:
Albert Einstein

Nobel Lecture

Lecture delivered to the Nordic Assembly of Naturalists at Gothenburg, July 11, 1923

Fundamental ideas and problems of the theory of relativity

Read the Nobel Lecture
